activities.name: Swimming
activities.description: Head to a local pool with friends an enjoy the day there

activities.name: Hiking
activities.description: Lookup some trails nearby. Be sure to bring water!

activities.name: Shopping
activities.description: Go to the mall! You never know what deals you'll find.

activities.name: Flag Football
activities.description: Call up a number of friends to get a game of flag football going!

activities.name: Movie Marathon
activities.description: Netflix and chill kind of night? How could you go wrong!

activities.name: Walk the Beach
activities.description: If you live by any beaches and want to be in the gret outdoors, take a walk on the sand and listen to the peaceful sounds of the ocean.

activities.name: Bike Ride
activities.description: Get moving! Go on a bike ride with some friends.

activities.name: Picnic in a park
activities.description: Grab some food and bring it to the park for a nice picnic on the grass!
